name: Mars Minotaur
description:
There is a Minotaur roaming the maze. Make your way through to the end without running into him. You have 3 chain traps that you can set to trip him up and slow him down. 

CONTROLS: Use WASD to move and RIGHT CLICK to place chain traps in front of you.

CREDITS:

  • Skybox is from Skybox Series Free 2D by Avionix on the Unity Asset Store
  • Rocket is Rocket (Cartoon, Capsule) by Whaleride on the Unity Asset Store
  • Wall texture is Seamless wall texture by hhh316 on DeviantArt
  • Ground texture is from Yughues Free Ground Materials by Nobiax/Yughues on the Unity Asset Store
  • Both characters are from Mixamo and so are all animations
  • Audio files are ghoul-ish monster by Darsycho and Remnants Of The Past by Lost_Dream on freesound.org
  • Character controls are from Unity's Starter Assets
